description: ff. 106. 13 Ramaḍān 1236H. Brockelmann, GAL, SII, 845 (no. 15); Fihrist-i kutub-i Shaykh-i ajall-i awhad-i marḥūm Shaykh Aḥmad Aḥsāʼī, II, 47; Malik 409. The work was completed 22 Shaʻbān 1211H. Incip.: الحمد لله ولى ما هو لى من نعمه

title: al-Risālah al-Tawbalīyah
